projectDescription:
Utilized ReactJS along with module CSS to develop the user interface
Employed the Context API along with useReducer to effectively manage the application state in React
Integrated Leaflet and React Leaflet to incorporate map functionality into the app

projectDescription:
Employed React along with CSS to craft the user interface
Utilized the OMDB API to fetch a list of movies by name and retrieve detailed information about specific movies
Developed a custom rating component with full customization, allowing for extensive configuration through the use of passed props
Implemented custom hooks to abstract and encapsulate state and logic, promoting reusability and modularization in the codebase

Employed React along with CSS to craft the user interface
Implemented the Context API along with useReducer to manage the application state, effectively avoiding prop drilling and ensuring a more efficient state management system
Developed a custom hook to streamline the usage of the Context API within the application, promoting reusability and simplifying the integration of context-related functionality

Used React, Material-UI Core, Icons, and CSS to create and style the user interface of the application
Implemented functionalities to create, list, and delete notes in the application

Integrated API calls and manipulated the DOM using Vanilla JavaScript, demonstrating dynamic interactions and data fetching in the application

Developed a website using HTML and CSS
Implemented responsive design using media queries

Challenged my CSS skills by creating a pixel-perfect replica of my Twitter profile
